page.title: 14Visit to Cape Cornwall
page.content: Cape Cornwall Comprehensive is a school for children aged 11 to 16 and children from the local Primary Schools go there.On Monday 8th of July the fourth year juniors from Sennen School went to Cape Cornwall school to see our forms,form tutors and have a tour round the school.When we had all arrived Mr Johns told us where to sit Desmond and I had to sit with a group of other people then Mr Johns said that we were sitting with the rest of the people in our form,our form was called 1k.The parents sat in the lower floor of the hall,Mr Roberts talked to our parents then he introduced us to the form tutors they were called Mrs Bishop,Miss Condy,Mr James and Mrs James who is our form tutor.Mrs James,a prefect and the children in her form all went to our form room.
